[size=6][color=red]*WiFi Manager*[/color][/size]

=============================================

==========

[img]http://i.imgur.com/DN9Qt3Q.png[/img]

[color=blue]Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Find, connect, manage WiFi networks. 

Improve connection quality with a graphical channel radar. 

Discover open networks around you.

Includes home screen widgets: one displays detailed 

connection info, another lets you switch among your 

favorite networks with a single tap, and yet another toggles 

WiFi Access Point.

Can scan for and switch to the best network out of several 

configured.

New and improved:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Better graphics, including a dark color theme;

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Assign your own descriptions and icons to individual WiFi 

networks - never forget what that "XYZ1234" network is;

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Switch among your favorite networks with a single tap by 

using the WiFi Network Switcher widget. It will even enable 

WiFi if needed.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatic switching between fixed and dynamic (DHCP) IP 

addresses (Android Settings in 2.* can't do this);

Some features require that you purchase the $1.75 

premium package, available right in the application 

through Google Checkout (safe, secure).

These features are: advanced per-network options 

(description, icon, IP address), the one-tap network widget, 

and two widget themes inspired by Android 4.0.

All the other - essential - features are free: the widget with 

detailed connection info (four sizes, two free themes), 

scanning and connecting to networks, the network list 

view, the network signal radar.

Orders are processed and saved by Google and can be 

reactivated after a phone reset / flash, or on a new phone.

About requested permissions:

"Change system settings" is needed to switch between 

fixed and dynamic IP addresses, if configured so.

"Prevent phone from sleeping" is needed so you can enable 

automatic scanning and discover open networks around 

you.

"Market billing service" is needed to make purchases.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Ã¢â‚¬Â¢
Since version 2.5, supports per-network IP address and 

proxy server settings on Android 3.* / 4.*, included in the 

free version.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Ã¢â‚¬Â¢

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Ã¢â‚¬Â¢

Also - a visually matching Bluetooth toggle widget. Find it 

below under "Related" and "Developer Info".

3.0.9

Bug fixes, updated translations.

Note: all premium features available.

This app has no advertisements!![/color]
